tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilHealthData (
  soil_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  institution_id UUID,
  soil_type VARCHAR(50),
  pH FLOAT,
  nutrient_levels JSONB
)

CREATE TABLE soil_health_data (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  institution_id INT,
  pH FLOAT,
  moisture FLOAT,
  organic_matter FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES research_institutions(id)
);

CREATE TABLE soil_health_data (
   data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   sample_date DATE NOT NULL,
   location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
   nitrogen_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
   phosphorus_level FLOAT NOT NULL,
   potassium_level FLOAT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE data_sharing (
   sharing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   data_id INT NOT NULL,
   institution_id INT NOT NULL,
   sharing_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (data_id) REFERENCES soil_health_data(data_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES research_institutions(institution_id)
);

CREATE TABLE user_access (
   access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   user_id INT NOT NULL,
   institution_id INT NOT NULL,
   access_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_account(user_id),
   FOREIGN KEY (institution_id) REFERENCES research_institutions(institution_id)
);
